Class ClientStorage¶

Client storage implementation

Constructor¶

class ClientStorage()¶

Methods¶

addListener¶

ClientStorage#addListener(callback)¶
Arguments:
  • callback –

get¶

ClientStorage#get(key[, isTransient])¶
Arguments:
  • key (String) –
  • isTransient (Boolean) – whether to use persistent storage or transient storage (defaults to false)
Throws Error:

: if client storage is not supported
Returns String|Boolean:
 

the value of key or null on failure

Retrieves the value of key from storage

remove¶

ClientStorage#remove(key[, isTransient])¶
Arguments:
  • key (String) –
  • isTransient (Boolean) – whether to use persistent storage or transient storage (defaults to false)
Throws Error:

: if client storage is not supported

Remove the key from storage

removeListener¶

ClientStorage#removeListener(callback)¶
Arguments:
  • callback –

set¶

ClientStorage#set(key, value[, isTransient])¶
Arguments:
  • key (String) –
  • value (Object) –
  • isTransient (Boolean) – whether to use persistent storage or transient storage (defaults to false)
Throws Error:

: if client storage is not supported

Set the value of key (add it if key doesn’t exist) into storage
